price: "Kuma ƙirjĩna ya yi ƙunci* kuma harshẽna bã zai saku ba sabõda haka ka aika zuwa ga Harũna.
arabic: وَيَضِيقُ صَدۡرِي وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِي فَأَرۡسِلۡ إِلَىٰ هَٰرُونَ
footnotes: * Mũsa yanã nũna cewa, shi yanã jin tsõro kada ya zama ya gajarta wajen iyar da manzanci, dõmin shi mai saurin fushine, yanã neman a taimake shi ɗan'uwansa Hãrũna.Wannan ya yi kama da farkon sũrar inda Annabi, tshĩra da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare shi, ya nũna tsõron taƙaitãwa ga iyar da manzancin Allah zuwa ga mutãnensa dõmin haka ba su yi ĩmãni ba. Hãlin Annabawa duka ɗaya ne ga tsõron taƙaita aikin Ubangijinsu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayaḍīqu ṣadrī walā yanṭaliqu lisānī fa-arsil ilā hārūna
